actions.title: [SITE WATCHER] Wire x402 payment into headless-markets â€” 6+ day stall, ESCALATING
actions.reason: Build stall reached 6+ days (~144h). 13+ consecutive scout cycles with no commits. x402 is becoming agent-to-agent payment standard on Base. AgentScan ERC-8004 launched with 17,887 agents on Base. Every cycle without x402 integration = compounding risk vs nullpath.com (live at $0, already using x402).

market_signals.key_finding: AgentScan launched on Base as ERC-8004 AI agent discovery layer. Base dominates with 17,887 agent registrations vs Ethereum's 1,967. Strong network effects emerging. x402 HTTP payment standard gaining institutional tracking. Base ecosystem shows 1.23M addresses, 85% new user conversion, $100M+ ETH transaction value.
